cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c1 =(Unit ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

comment: A unit is an element of the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
